history.proof: intros A P Q. split. - intros. qsimpl time: 1. sauto depth: 3. - intros. qsimpl time: 1. sauto depth: 3.

exceptions.exn: In environment A : Type P, Q : Ensemble A H : Disjoint A P Q Unable to unify "Disjoint A P Q" with "Disjoint A Q P".

In environment A : Type P, Q : Ensemble A H : Disjoint A Q P Unable to unify "Disjoint A Q P" with "Disjoint A P Q".

chat.content:
I will give you a Coq proof state, including both hypotheses and a specific goal and your need to prove it. Your response should be a singular code block of Coq proof starting with "```coq
", ending with "Qed.```", without any additional explanation or commentary. Follow to these guidelines:
Introduce variables using unique names to avoid any conflicts.
Keep each command distinct and separated, avoid concatenations like ';' or '[cmd|cmd]'.
Organize your proof with bullets like '-', '+', and '*' instead of braces ({, }). Shift to their double symbols like '--' and '++', when necessary.
Effectively use given premises, follow the syntax and structure demonstrated in the examples provided.

Example 1:

Hypotheses:
n, m: nat
IHn: m + n = n + m

Goal:
m + S n = S n + m

Proof:
```coq
simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Example 2:
Hypotheses:

Goal:
forall n m : nat, m + n = n + m

```coq
intros n m. induction n.
- simpl. auto.
- simpl. rewrite <- IHn. auto.
Qed.```

Solve This Proof State:

Hypotheses:


Goal:
forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q <-> Disjoint A Q P

Premises:
Inductive GFormula (TA TX AA AF : Type) : Type := TT : Tauto.GFormula | FF : Tauto.GFormula | X : TX -> Tauto.GFormula | A : TA -> AA -> Tauto.GFormula | Cj : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | D : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | N : Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula | I : Tauto.GFormula -> option AF -> Tauto.GFormula -> Tauto.GFormula For GFormula: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For TT: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For FF: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For X: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted For A: Arguments TA, TX, AA, AF are implicit and maximally inserted
Disjoint : forall U : Type, Ensemble U -> Ensemble U -> Prop
Ensemble = fun U : Type => U -> Prop : Type -> Type Argument scope is [type_scope]
Record Q : Set := Qmake { Qnum : BinNums.Z; Qden : BinNums.positive } For Qmake: Argument scopes are [Z_scope positive_scope]
Union_left_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A (Union A P Q) R < -> Disjoint A P R /\ Disjoint A Q R
Union_right_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Disjoint A R (Union A P Q) < -> Disjoint A R P /\ Disjoint A R Q
Included_Complement_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Included P (Complement A Q) < -> Disjoint A P Q
Included_Disjoint : forall (A : Type) (P Q P' Q' : Ensemble A), Included P P' -> Included Q Q' -> Disjoint A P' Q' -> Disjoint A P Q
Disjoint_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Disjoint A P Q < -> (forall x : A, P x -> Q x -> False)
Same_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set P Q < -> pointwise_relation A iff P Q
Union_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Union A P Q v < -> P v \/ Q v
Intersection_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A) (P Q : Ensemble A), Intersection A P Q v < -> P v /\ Q v
Intersection_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A Q P)
Union_comm : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A P Q) (Union A Q P)
Intersection_Union_distr_r : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A P (Union A Q R)) (Union A (Intersection A P Q) (Intersection A P R))
Intersection_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Intersection A P Q) R) (Intersection A P (Intersection A Q R))
Union_assoc : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Union A (Union A P Q) R) (Union A P (Union A Q R))
Intersection_Complement : forall (A : Type) (P Q : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Complement A P) (Complement A Q)) (Complement A (Union A P Q))
Intersection_Union_distr_l : forall (A : Type) (P Q R : Ensemble A), Same_set (Intersection A (Union A Q R) P) (Union A (Intersection A Q P) (Intersection A R P))
Complement_Included_rev : forall (U : Type) (P Q : Ensemble U), Included P Q -> Included (Complement U Q) (Complement U P)
Union_Included : forall P Q R : Ensemble ?A, Included (Union ?A P Q) R < -> Included P R /\ Included Q R where ?A : [ |- Type]
right_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included Q (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
left_Included_Union : forall P Q : Ensemble ?A, Included P (Union ?A P Q) where ?A : [ |- Type]
List.Forall_cons : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l)
list_ind : forall (A : Type) (P : list A -> Prop), P nil -> (forall (a : A) (l : list A), P l -> P (a :: l)%list) -> forall l : list A, P l
List.Forall_nil : forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop), List.Forall P nil
Included_Full_set : forall (A : Type) (P : Ensemble A), Included P (Full_set A)
Disjoint_sind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : SProp), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_rec : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Set), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_ind : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Prop), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Disjoint_rect : forall (U : Type) (B C : Ensemble U) (P : Type), ((forall x : U, ~ In U (Intersection U B C) x) -> P) -> Disjoint U B C -> P
Full_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A), Full_set A v < -> True
Empty_set_spec : forall (A : Type) (v : A), Empty_set A v < -> False
Inductive Forall (A : Type) (P : A -> Prop) : list A -> Prop := Forall_nil : List.Forall P nil | Forall_cons : forall (x : A) (l : list A), P x -> List.Forall P l -> List.Forall P (x :: l) For Forall: Argument A is implicit For Forall_nil: Argument A is implicit For Forall_cons: Arguments A, P, l are implicit For Forall: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope list_scope] For Forall_nil: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope] For Forall_cons: Argument scopes are [type_scope function_scope _ list_scope _ _]

```coq
intros A P Q.
split.
- intros H x HP HQ. apply H. assumption. assumption.
- intros H x HP HQ. apply H. assumption. assumption.
Qed.
```

original: intros A P Q. split. - intros H x HP HQ. apply H. auto. auto. - intros H x HP HQ. apply H. auto. auto.
